data.title: Mastercard Incorporated (MA) CEO Michael Miebach presents at Virtual Deutsche Bank Technology Conference (Transcript)

data.title: Mastercard & HSBC to Promote Sustainable Urban Development
data.text: Mastercard (MA) collaborates with HSBC, which joins Mastercard's City Possible network for addressing several urban challenges.
